description:
Villainous nightmare creatures have
escaped from the Realm of Dreams
and placed all of Skylands under a
terrible sleep spell. You and the
Skylanders now have the amazing
ability to capture the villains and
return them to Skylands to fight for
you! Begin the ultimate 3D adventure
as you explore Skylands in search of
the escaped villains!
name: Skylanders Trap Team™
disclaimer:
The included Portal of Power and at
least two Skylanders Trap Team™,
Skylanders SWAP Force™, Skylanders
Giants™ or Skylanders Spyro’s
Adventure® figures are required to
start the Story mode tutorial.
